aircraft.value: Dragonfly Scout - AC-2673-219 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 14/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 15/06/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 16/06/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 17/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 23/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
